okio

Interface BufferedSink

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.io.Closeable, Sink
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Buffer

    public interface BufferedSink
extends Sink
    A sink that keeps a buffer internally so that callers can do small writes without a performance penalty.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Buffer buffer()
      Returns this sink's internal buffer.
      BufferedSink emitCompleteSegments()
      Writes complete segments to this sink.
      java.io.OutputStream outputStream()
      Returns an output stream that writes to this sink.
      BufferedSink write(byte[] source)
      Like OutputStream.write(int), this writes a complete byte array to this sink.
      BufferedSink write(byte[] source, int offset, int byteCount)
      Like OutputStream.write(int), this writes byteCount bytes of source, starting at offset.
      BufferedSink write(ByteString byteString) 
      BufferedSink writeByte(int b)
      Writes a byte to this sink.
      BufferedSink writeInt(int i)
      Writes a big-endian int to this sink using four bytes.
      BufferedSink writeIntLe(int i)
      Writes a little-endian int to this sink using four bytes.
      BufferedSink writeLong(long v)
      Writes a big-endian long to this sink using eight bytes.
      BufferedSink writeLongLe(long v)
      Writes a little-endian long to this sink using eight bytes.
      BufferedSink writeShort(int s)
      Writes a big-endian short to this sink using two bytes.
      BufferedSink writeShortLe(int s)
      Writes a little-endian short to this sink using two bytes.
      BufferedSink writeString(java.lang.String string, java.nio.charset.Charset charset)
      Encodes string in charset and writes it to this sink.
      BufferedSink writeUtf8(java.lang.String string)
      Encodes string in UTF-8 and writes it to this sink.

      • Methods inherited from interface okio.Sink

        close, flush, timeout, write

      • emitCompleteSegments

        BufferedSink emitCompleteSegments()
                           throws java.io.IOException
